title: What is going to happen with the US Coast Guard Loran Station property on River Road, Wilmington NC now that they have removed the towers?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/what-will-happen-with-the-coast-guard-land-on-river-road-now-that-the-loran-towers-are-gone/
